attributes.action: Be the Fairy Godmother to his Constituent Kayleigh Baker so she can go to the ball
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kayleigh Baker, an A-grade pupil at Hurworth School, near Darlington, County Durhamhas been banned from her school prom because her parents refused to allow her to attend extra revision lessons.  She has also been thrown off the netball team , as punishment for the decision.
The child is being punished for the actions of her parents (refusing to sign a permission slip) - this is an  unlawful act by the school.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
